attributes.name: Advanced 2 (Freestyle 3) - Saturday 11:45am
attributes.description:
NOTE: Please read the description for your registered class time.
Warm-Up Time: 11:45am - 12:15pm
Class time: 12:15pm - 12:45pm

Advanced 2/ Freestyle 3 Second Advanced level skating class for ages 6-17

Class Curriculum:

  1. Backward outside pivot
  2. Change foot spin.
  3. Backward spiral
  4. Salchow jump.
  5. Toe Loop jump
  6. Backward outside three turns

There is No refunds, make ups or credits for missed classes.
